name: Peach Fields Hair & Body Mist
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: What it is:A fresh fragrance for your hair and body with notes of peach, osmanthus, and sandalwood..Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Fruity Florals.Key Notes:White Peach, Osmanthus, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:This is a dreamy fine fragrance for your hair and body to spritz wherever life takes you. Peach Fields is a delicious and juicy peach-inspired fragrance. White peach notes mingle with sandalwood to create an irresistible fruity-floral profile with a grounded, woody base..About the Bottle:The Skylar Hair and Body Mist is a lightweight plastic bottle made with 30% recycled materials. A portable and convenient size to take with you on-the-go. All Skylar bottles and caps are 100% recyclable..About the Fragrance:Skylar was founded by u2018mompreneuru2019 Cat Chen after her daughteru2019s allergic reaction to her perfume. Dreamy Skylar fragrances are safe for you and safe for everyone around you. They are vegan, cruelty-free, hypoallergenic, and sensitive-skin safe.
ingredients: Organic sugar cane alcohol, Aqua/Water, 1-(2,2,6-Trimethylcyclohexyl)-3-hexanol, 2,6-Dimethyl-7-Octen-2-ol, 2-t-Butylcyclohexyl Acetate, 3-(5,5,6-Trimethylbicyclo[2.2.1]hept-2-yl)cyclohexan-1-ol, 5-Cyclopentadecen-1-one, 3-methyl, 6,6-Dimethoxy-2,5,5-trimethylhex-2-ene, Acetic acid, (1-oxopropoxy)-, 1-(3,3-dimethylcyclohexyl)ethyl ester, u03b1-Phellandrene, Dimethylcyclohexylethoxy, Isobutylpropanoate, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethyl Linalool, Ethyl Trimethylcyclopentene Butenol, Ethylene Brassylate, Gamma-Decalactone, Gamma-Undecalactone, Hexyl Salicylate, Isobutyl Methyl Tetrahydropyranol, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Methyldihydrojasmonate, Naphtho[2,1-b]furan, dodecahydro-3a,6,6,9a-tetramethyl-, (3aR,5aS,9aS,9bR), Oxacycloheptadec-10-ene-2-one, Oxacyclohexadec-12-en-2-one, (12E), Pentadecalactone Sandalore, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Tetramethyl tricyclo undecane, Triethyl Citrate, Betaine, Panthenol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz safely on hair, skin, and cotton or polyester fabrics..-Layer multiple Skylar fragrances together to create different possibilities and give your fragrance maximum impact...Recycling Instructions:.-This bottle and cap are 100% recyclable. When bottle is empty, remove cap and pump and wash thoroughly. .-Recycle the bottle and cap and place pump in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not the biggest fan of this scent sadly. It is very strong and woody, the peach smell kind of melts into a grassy or woody smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: packaging feels really cheap and the scent is subpar. absolutely not worth $30. Buy the perfume instead!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this!  It is a light fragrance that is the PERFECT gym bag companion.  I spray it after hot yoga before heading home to make sure I don't offend anyone!  It is a light, smell, I just love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this hair fragrance every day since I bought it and I couldn't be happier. The scent lasts all throughout my work day and it's just heavenly. Peach lovers, this is your dream come true! Such a sweet and gentle fragrance, I'm curious about the brand's other smells. Will be purchasing another!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally thought it smelled like musty water...I didn't smell peach at all. However my 13 yo daughter liked it so I gave it to her.

reviews.review_title: This product is fantastic and smells amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this fragrance on my hair, lives no deciduous on my hair the fragrance is soft and las ahora perfect we you wash your hair every other day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell doesn't last long. Ay first smells good but the aroma goes away quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, notSure skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing but does not last. I know itu2019s only a spray/mist but for the price I would appreciate if it lasted longer than 30 min. I tried it on my hair and my hair still smells like my shampoo & conditioner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an exciting new launch! Absolutely love Skylar they are so gentle and natural definitely give us amazing scents which Iu2019m such a big fan for. This new scent is so pretty and sweet so glad to have it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like it much  It doesn't make any difference to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells a lot like the peach spray from bath and body works but three times the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair
reviews.review_text: I wonu2019t buy it again- but itu2019s ok. Smells a bit like alcohol to me. Not the same quality as Victoria secret. Iu2019d rather buy sprays from them because they smell better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like sweet, fresh summer. Lasts longer than my other expensive perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Instant headache with first sprayu2026 it smells like pure chemicalsu2026 had to change and take a long shower with a whole lot of body wash to get rid of the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible. if you love very strong perfume scents...then by all means this is the product for you. It's so strong I wish I had never sprayed it on my hair and body. I really wanted to like it because I love anything peachy with sandalwood. This is a very hard NO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely in LOVE with this scent! I have peach fields in a rollerball, but much like salt air, itu2019s too heavy on the u2018woodu2019 part of the scent imo. I feel itu2019s overpowering, & distracting from both salt air & peach fields. This hair & body mist is just perfection. The wood is just barely there. You get much more juicy peach. Iu2019m in LOVE!! $30 is a little pricey, cause you do have to reapply like most body/hair mists. But Iu2019ll see how long these last me. My favorite way to wear these is do the vanilla sky body mist, let it dry. Then do twice as much peach fields, as you did the vanilla. Have to apply vanilla first though, or it will drown out the delicate peach scent. This is a WINNER Skylar. Iu2019m thinking about subscribing to them again. Iu2019d love to see a salt air body/hair mist. Iu2019m hoping it will be deliciously aquatic, yet light on the wood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair fragrance smells light and fresh, not perfume-y. It leaves behind a bit of shine, and can also be used as a body mist. And like all of the Skylar products Iu2019ve tried, it doesnu2019t irritate my daughteru2019s fragrance sensitivities

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent! It's so light and fruity and lasts for a couple hours. I like how it's gentle enough to be used on my hair. I have a sensitive scalp so I was hesitant to try this on my hair but I didn't have any reactions to it. It's also a nice travel size and can easily fit in many purses. I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells absolutely amazing. Iu2019m normally very sensitive to bodymists and perfumes, but this is light and fresh, and I will be layering it with the perfume. LOVE!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE Skylar scents, BUT the reason for the 3 stars is that it does not last at all!  By the time I arrive to work, the smell is almost completely gone! I've even mixed it with lotion to try and make it last longer, but it didn't work. So dad because it smells amazing, but for the price, I'd rather buy something that stays with me for the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this scent, and Iu2019ve been pleasantly surprised at how long it lasts too- my past experience with body sprays is that the scent just doesnu2019t have a lot of staying power, but this is definitely an exception! The scent itself is fruity and woody, a combination I feel makes it super versatile- itu2019s great for multiple seasons!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy that the product was in all over spray not just our body spray. The smell is phenomenal it lasts for hours and hours it's easy to throw on your handbag and take him to go. Because that's an all over spray you don't have to pay an outrageous price to get an all-in-one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that Skylar Clean Beauty has come out with hair and body mists. I have purchased a few of their perfume discovery collections and love most of the scents. This is the PERFECT refresher on days that I don't wash my hair, a few sprays lasts all day. This smells really good,but unlike other reviews I find the sandalwood overpowers the peach quite a bit- I love sandalwood so works great for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent: itu2019s a sweet smell for sure, and obviously smells strongly of peaches. But itu2019s clean and refreshing. I love that I can use it in my hair as well as my bodyy and I love that itu2019s inexpensive.  A total winner for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to use this hair and body mist to see how well it held up and the smell. It was very fragrant and and smelled very sweet which I appreciate some days. Overall, made me feel very sweet and worth it at the price point!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the third of many Skylar fragrances that I own, and I absolutely love this. It has a delicious fresh peaches sent to it which is perfect for all seasons. I love to apply this to my hair right after I finish styling it in the scent is so beautiful. I also apply this to run errands or meet up with friends and everyone always compliments on how beautiful my perfume smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful scent by skylar fragnance. It smeels so delicious peachy gourmand kind of scnet. It is perfect for aummer and early fall daytime scent. The bottle is a good size and easy to travel with too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this mist from Skylar beauty! Iu2019m a member of their sent club but have yet to try a spray like this. I have to say Iu2019m so impressed!! This peach smells amazing (not surprised) and lasts all day. You have to try these if you havenu2019t yet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so excited to see Skylar release these sprays. I already love the perfumes and love that I can just thrown this one in my bag. This scent is one Iu2019ve been looking forward to trying and it didnu2019t disappoint. It lasts a decent amount when sprayed on the hair though on clothing I donu2019t find it lasts as long. I would repurchase again because the peach scent is delightful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells so good and I always get compliments when I use it! The scent is fresh and I love how soft the mist is. Itu2019s great for on the go and I think itu2019s a great price for the quality since itu2019s long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Delicious! This mist smells exactly like I hoped it would; super juicy and fruity with warm floral notes. I definitely get peach notes. Itu2019s sweet and probably more of a spring/summer scent for me, but itu2019s so yummy that I will probably be reaching for it year round. The mist is fine and the concentration & wear time is what you would expect for a mist. This fragrance is playful and fun I recommend it if you like fruity scents. (Received free for my review.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To me, this Peach Fields Hair and Body mist from Skylar didnu2019t have any peach scent, but it has super fine mist with powdery floral scent. I feel like I can use it all seasons, and I can layer it with other perfumes to change the scent. Itu2019s a nice value for a two in one body & hair product, that comes in a travel size bottle. The only thing is - it lasts about 2 hours on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Peach fields has been my staple scent for the summer and Iu2019m obsessed I have a hair and body mist to layer it with and make it project more! Itu2019s so juicy and such a nice peach scent sweet and not over powering!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with this body spray. It smells amazing. It has a fresh, sweet, woody scent that is very light and not overpowering and lasts for hours. I also like that I can take it in my purse or backpack and will not break. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Using this product puts me in such a good mood!! I love the scent- itu2019s the perfect balance, long lasting and not too overpowering. Itu2019s such an easy step to add to your routine and I love how clean this brand is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is so strong with just one spray.  The smell is neither fruity nor floral.  It reminds me of walking through the perfume section of a big Sephora or department store where you smell all perfume together.  This is going back. back to Sephora
